Body:
- Fingerprint sensor (PayPal certified)
- Samsung Pay (Visa, MasterCard certified)

Camera.Features: Geo-tagging, touch focus, face detection, Auto HDR, panorama
Camera.Primary: 16 MP, 2988 x 5312 pixels, optical image stabilization, autofocus, LED flash
Camera.Secondary: 5 MP, 1440p@30fps, dual video call, Auto HDR

Comms.WLAN: Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac, dual-band, Wi-Fi Direct, hotspot

Features:
- Wireless charging (PMA) - market dependent
- ANT+ support
- S-Voice natural language commands and dictation
- Smart stay
- Active noise cancellation with dedicated mic
- MP4/DivX/XviD/WMV/H.264 player
- MP3/WAV/WMA/eAAC+/FLAC player
- Photo/video editor
- Document editor
Features.Messaging: SMS(threaded view), MMS, Email, Push Mail, IM
Features.Sensors: Accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass, barometer, heart rate, SpO2

Misc.Colors: White Pearl, Black Sapphire, Gold Platinum

Network.Speed: HSPA 42.2/5.76 Mbps, LTE Cat6 300/50 Mbps, EV-DO Rev.A 3.1 Mbps

Platform.CPU: Quad-core 1.5 GHz Cortex-A53 & Quad-core 2.1 GHz Cortex-A57
Platform.OS: Android OS, v5.0.2 (Lollipop), upgradable to v5.1 (Lollipop)

canonical_name.text:
Also known as Samsung Galaxy S6 SM-G920
Curved screen version available - Samsung Galaxy S6 edge
Available versions: SM-G920P (Sprint), SM-G920V (Verizon), SM-G920R (US Cellular), SM-G920W8 (Canada)
